${ModID}:DoubleEspresso.NAME: Double Espresso
${ModID}:DoubleEspresso.FLAVOR: Two shots of espresso in one tin.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#924ee4]Espresso [#924ee4]Express. The first #b3 times you #y${ModID}:Stash a card each combat, gain an additional [E] next turn.

${ModID}:EspressoExpress.NAME: Espresso Express
${ModID}:EspressoExpress.FLAVOR: A small can packed with a shot of instant energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #y${ModID}:Stash a card each combat, gain an additional [E] next turn.
